task.title: Transfer user account privileges
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to assign the privileges (permissions and resource access) of one user account to another.

step.cmd: Click Transfer in the row of the user account you want to transfer.
On the Transfer page, select the user account to receive this user's privileges.
Select the account resources to transfer, then click Transfer.
Click OK to confirm that you want to transfer the selected account resources.

stepresult.p: The receiving user receives all rights for the selected account resources owned by the original user.
stepresult.note: Ad hoc analytics permissions cannot be transferred. If your organization uses multiple login companies, you cannot transfer anything between login companies.
